turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Ten-Day War.
turn.1: What happened during the Dravograd Offensive?
turn.2: A protracted engagement between YPA and Slovenian TO forces took place during the afternoon and evening at Dravograd, and a number of YPA facilities around the country fell to Slovenian forces.
turn.4: At 21:00, the Slovenian Presidency announced a unilateral ceasefire.
turn.6: However, this was rejected by the YPA leadership, which vowed to "take control" and crush Slovenian resistance.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: A large YPA armoured convoy set off from Belgrade on the morning of 3 July, ostensibly to go to Slovenia.
turn.10: It never arrived; according to the official account, this was due to mechanical breakdowns.
turn.11: Did anything else happen during the aftermath?
turn.12: Fighting continued in Slovenia, with a YPA relief force heading for the Gornja Radgona border crossing being halted near Radenci.
